title: Chris Oldmeadow
text: I‚Äôm a biostatistician and data scientist who works with clinicians and researchers to transform data into insights that improve health care and outcomes. My work focuses on the design of high-quality, innovative studies, with a strong emphasis on methodological rigour, collaboration, and real-world impact.

title: About
text: Associate Professor Oldmeadow is an experienced applied statistician with a strong record of statistical leadership in clinical trials and health data science. He is Head of Research Design at the Hunter Medical Research Institute.

title: About
text:
Professional Summary
Associate Professor Oldmeadow is an experienced applied statistician with a strong record of statistical leadership in clinical trials and health data science. He is Head of Research Design at the Hunter Medical Research Institute.
